titleStmt.title: The sinners sanctuary. By Thomas Packer, his Majesties servant
titleStmt.author: Packer, Thomas, fl. 1628-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Edward Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Pauls churchyard at the signe of the Angel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Pauls churchyard at the signe of the Angel
